segments.text: What can I do for you , sir ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: What have you got this morning ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Fruit juice , cakes and refreshments , and everything .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'd like to have a glass of tomato juice , please .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , a dish of cream of wheat .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , bacon and eggs with buttered toast . I like my bacon very crisp .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: How do you want your eggs ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No , that's enough . T hank you .
segments.speaker: S2
